name: Pebbles Development Environment
install: bash -c 'echo "ðŸš€ Setting up Pebbles environment..." && which clojure >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo "Clojure not found, installing..." && curl -fsSL https://download.clojure.org/install/linux-install-1.11.1.1413.sh | sudo bash) && docker --version >/dev/null 2>&1 || (sudo apt-get update -qq && sudo apt-get install -y docker.io docker-compose) && echo "export USE_EXISTING_MONGO=true" >> ~/.bashrc && echo "export MONGO_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/pebbles" >> ~/.bashrc && echo "export PORT=8081" >> ~/.bashrc && echo "âœ… Dependencies verified"'
start: bash -c 'sudo docker info >/dev/null 2>&1 || (sudo dockerd >/dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 5) && (sudo docker ps | grep -q mongodb || sudo docker-compose up -d mongodb) && echo "âœ… Services started"'

terminals.name: MongoDB Status
terminals.command: echo 'MongoDB Status:' && sudo docker ps | grep mongodb || echo 'MongoDB not running'

terminals.name: USE_EXISTING_MONGO Status
terminals.command: echo 'USE_EXISTING_MONGO Status:' && echo $USE_EXISTING_MONGO || echo 'USE_EXISTING_MONGO not set'
